thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Stronger Dollar Ahead of Fed Decision Hurts Gold

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stronger Dollar Ahead of Fed Decision Hurts Gold

organizations.name: stronger dollar ahead of fed decision hurts gold gold

text:
Gold prices slid Tuesday with the dollar and Treasury yields rising before the Federal Reserve’s latest interest-rate decision and outlook for the year.
Front-month gold for March delivery shed 0.4% to $1,311.10 a troy ounce on the Comex division of the New York Mercantile Exchange--its fourth decline in the last five sessions. Prices have stayed between about $1,305 and $1,360 this year, moving within that range based on swings in the dollar and investors’ focus on higher interest rates.
...
